sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Sidebar from './sidebar'; class HouseInAstrology extends Component { render() { let publicUrl = process.env.PUBLIC_URL + '/' let imagealt = 'image' return (

  • 28 March 2025

Stars In Astrology

üè† 12 Houses in Vedic Astrology (‡Æ™‡Ææ‡Æµ‡Æô‡Øç‡Æï‡Æ≥‡Øç)

Each house (‡Æ™‡Ææ‡Æµ‡ÆÆ‡Øç) reflects a different life domain ‚Äî like career, marriage, money, health, etc. They are counted from the Ascendant (Lagna / ‡Æ≤‡Æï‡Øç‡Æ©‡ÆÆ‡Øç).

House Tamil Name Represents
1st House ‡Æ≤‡Æï‡Øç‡Æ© ‡Æ™‡Ææ‡Æµ‡ÆÆ‡Øç üßç Self, personality, body, health, beginnings
2nd House ‡Æ§‡Æ© ‡Æ™‡Ææ‡Æµ‡ÆÆ‡Øç üí∞ Money, speech, family, values, food
3rd House ‡Æö‡Æï‡Øã‡Æ§‡Æ∞ ‡Æ™‡Ææ‡Æµ‡ÆÆ‡Øç üìù Siblings, courage, communication, efforts
4th House ‡ÆÆ‡Ææ‡Æ©‡Øç‡Æö ‡Æ™‡Ææ‡Æµ‡ÆÆ‡Øç üè° Mother, home, comforts, vehicles, emotions
5th House ‡Æ™‡ØÅ‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡Æø‡Æ∞ ‡Æ™‡Ææ‡Æµ‡ÆÆ‡Øç üéì Children, education, intelligence, romance
6th House ‡Æ∑‡Æü‡Øç‡Æ∞‡ØÅ ‡Æ™‡Ææ‡Æµ‡ÆÆ‡Øç ‚öîÔ∏è Enemies, debts, diseases, obstacles
7th House ‡Æï‡Æ≤‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ∞ ‡Æ™‡Ææ‡Æµ‡ÆÆ‡Øç üíç Marriage, spouse, business partnerships
8th House ‡ÆÖ‡Æ∑‡Øç‡Æü‡ÆÆ ‡Æ™‡Ææ‡Æµ‡ÆÆ‡Øç ‚ò†Ô∏è Longevity, secrets, transformation, inheritance
9th House ‡Æ™‡Ææ‡Æï‡Øç‡ÆØ ‡Æ™‡Ææ‡Æµ‡ÆÆ‡Øç üôè Luck, dharma, father, fortune, higher learning
10th House ‡Æï‡Æ∞‡Øç‡ÆÆ ‡Æ™‡Ææ‡Æµ‡ÆÆ‡Øç üëî Career, reputation, status, public life
11th House ‡Æ≤‡Ææ‡Æ™ ‡Æ™‡Ææ‡Æµ‡ÆÆ‡Øç üìà Gains, income, friends, desires, success
12th House ‡Æµ‡Æø‡Æ∞‡ØÅ‡Æï‡Øç‡Æ§‡Æø ‡Æ™‡Ææ‡Æµ‡ÆÆ‡Øç üßò Losses, moksha, foreign lands, sleep, expenses

üß≠ How to Use the Houses in Reading:

  • House Lord: The planet ruling the sign in that house
  • House Occupants: Which planets sit in the house
  • Aspects (Drishti): Which planets aspect the house
  • Karaka (Significator): Natural planet related to that house's theme (e.g., Venus for 7th, Jupiter for 5th)
"Each house is a stage in your soul‚Äôs journey ‚Äî from birth (1st) to liberation (12th)."

‚úÖ Bonus Tips

  • Analyze the strength of planets with Shadbala before judging their results.
  • Retrograde planets often give different results in different houses.
  • For career, examine 1st (self), 10th (profession), 6th (service), and 11th (gains).
  • Marriage predictions use 1st (self), 7th (partner), 2nd (family), and Venus/Mars/Jupiter influence.

üß† Shadbala Summary (6-Fold Planetary Strength)

Shadbala evaluates how strong a planet is to deliver its results effectively. It includes:

1Ô∏è‚É£ Sthana Bala (Positional Strength)

Strength from position in exaltation, own sign, mooltrikona, etc.

2Ô∏è‚É£ Dig Bala (Directional Strength)

Gained when planets are in their favorable directions (e.g., Jupiter in 1st, Mars in 10th).

3Ô∏è‚É£ Kala Bala (Temporal Strength)

Time-based strength ‚Äî based on year, month, day, hora, etc.

4Ô∏è‚É£ Chesta Bala (Motional Strength)

Gained when planets are retrograde or stationary ‚Äî powerful states!

5Ô∏è‚É£ Naisargika Bala (Natural Strength)

Intrinsic strength by nature ‚Äî e.g., Sun is stronger than Moon, Jupiter stronger than Mercury, etc.

6Ô∏è‚É£ Drik Bala (Aspect Strength)

Gained when planets receive auspicious aspects and not malefic ones.

) } } export default HouseInAstrology;
